com.github.okamumu.jmtrandom

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.okamumu.jmtrandom.Random

  • public class Random
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to provide a random value following a variety of distributions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Random(long seed)
      Constructor.
      Random(MTRandInterface mtrand)
      Constructor with any random generator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double nextExp(double rate)
      Generate an exponential random number.
      double nextLogistic()
      Generate a standard logistic random number.
      double nextLogistic(double loc, double scale)
      Generate a logistic random number with location (loc) and scale parameters.
      double nextLogLogistic(double loclog, double scalelog)
      Generate a log-logistic random number from the original logistic distribution.
      double nextLogNormal(double meanlog, double sdlog)
      Generate a log-normal random variable from the original normal distribution with meanlog and standard variation (sdlog).
      double nextNormal()
      Generate a standard normal (mean 0, var 1) random number.
      double nextNormal(double mean, double sd)
      Generate a normal random variable with mean and standard variation (sd).
      double nextTruncLogistic(double loc, double scale)
      Generate a truncated logistic random number from the original logistic distribution.
      double nextTruncNormal(double mean, double sd)
      Generate a truncated normal random variable from the original normal distribution with mean and standard variation (sd).
      double nextUnif()
      Generate a uniform random number on (0,1)
      double nextUnif(double min, double max)
      Generate a uniform random number on (min, max)
      double nextWeibull(double shape, double scale)
      Generate a Weibull random number with shape and scale parameters.

      • Random

        public Random(long seed)
        Constructor. The default random generator uses MT64.
        Parameters:
        seed - An long integer

      • Random

        public Random(MTRandInterface mtrand)
        Constructor with any random generator.
        Parameters:
        mtrand - An object of MTRandInterface which is a random generator.

        Generate a uniform random number on (0,1)
        Returns:

        public double nextUnif(double min,
                       double max)
        Generate a uniform random number on (min, max)
        Parameters:
        min - A double value indicating the minimum of range.
        max - A double value indicating the maximum of range.
        Returns:
        A random number.

        Returns:

      • nextNormal

        public double nextNormal(double mean,
                         double sd)
        Generate a normal random variable with mean and standard variation (sd).
        Parameters:
        mean - A double value for the mean parameter.
        sd - A double value for the standard variation parameter.
        Returns:
        A random number.

      • nextTruncNormal

        public double nextTruncNormal(double mean,
                              double sd)
        Generate a truncated normal random variable from the original normal distribution with mean and standard variation (sd).
        Parameters:
        mean - A double value for the mean parameter of the original normal distribution.
        sd - A double value for the standard variation parameter of the original normal distribution.
        Returns:
        A random number.

        Parameters:
        meanlog - A double value for the mean parameter of the original normal distribution.
        sdlog - A double value for the standard variation parameter of the original normal distribution.
        Returns:
        A random number.
